import React from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; function MiniProject({proj, user}) { let navigate = useNavigate() function handleDetailsClick() { navigate(`/ProjectDetails/${user.id}`) } return (

{proj.title}

| Created by {user.first_name} {user.last_name}

{proj.description}

) } export default MiniProject
